author: Matt Larkin
description:
In 1996, Crystal Dynamics released a game called Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain for the original PlayStation. This introduced us to the dark, gothic world of Nosgoth, in which a murdered nobleman, the titular Kain, is raised as a vampire and given a chance at revenge. This premise turns out to be but a prologue […]

The post REVIEW: Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver 1&2 Remastered Edition appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver 1&2 Remastered Edition
